title: Karnataka Bank unveils credit line on UPI in partnership with Navi Technologies
description: Karnataka Bank and Navi Technologies launched credit lines on UPI under NPCI's initiative. Initially targeting a closed group of pre-qualified users, the product offers short-term monthly loans. The bank plans to expand its offerings to include EMI facilities and working capital credit based on customer feedback, aiming to provide secure and convenient credit access.
